mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS id, b.name AS name, b.introduction, d.name AS adminName, d.id AS adminId FROM building b, dormitory_admin d WHERE b.admin_id = d.id;
SELECT b.id AS id, b.name AS name, b.introduction, d.name AS adminName, d.id AS adminId FROM building b, dormitory_admin d WHERE b.admin_id = d.id AND b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%');
SELECT b.id AS id, b.name AS name, b.introduction, d.name AS adminName, d.id AS adminId FROM building b, dormitory_admin d WHERE b.admin_id = d.id AND b.introduction LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO building (name, introduction, admin_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{introduction}, #{adminId});
